name: Space War (itch) (N3verland)
description:
Welcome to Space War, a fast-paced strategy game!

In this game, you will need to take control different types of troop and make wise decisions to kill the enemy king and win your ultimate vitory for your planet!

Each turn, you can use one unit to move (and attack if there is an enemy in range), or revive one of those units that you have captured earlier in your territory.  Each unit have their own way of moving and attacking, Right-click to see their ability. Some units can be promoted when reaching a specific tile on the enemy territory.

That is all about Space War, enjoy!!!
